availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Louisville, Kentucky, laborer. Native of Ireland. Laborer in Louisville, Kentucky, in 1860. Charged with carrying a concealed weapon in Louisville in January 1863.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Jefferson County, Louisville, Ward 4, p. 4.
Tenth Manuscript Census of the United States (1880), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Jefferson County, Louisville, District 144, p. 240B.
"Richard Langan (1835-1902)," Find A Grave, Memorial 128021901, accessed March 31, 2023, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/128021901.
KYR-0001-029-0171.
